name: Forge Rampage
description:
Forge the right weapon for your heroes! Slay monsters to get coins and buy upgrades. Watch out for the class change bar, when it reaches zero, your hero will change its class and you will have to forge a new weapon.


1- You start with a hero, you have to slay monsters to get coins. Don't let the monsters hit you.

LEFT & RIGHT ARROW KEYS = MOVE
UP ARROW KEY = JUMP

2- When the class bar reaches zero, your hero will change its class.

3- Pay attention to the new class. Ex: Big Fire Viking or Small Ice Wizard

4- Forge the right weapon for the new class using the right combination of buttons
LEFT,UP AND RIGHT KEY = choose each of the attributes

FIRST ATTRIBUTE = SIZE -------> Left=Small Up=Medium Right=Big

SECOND ATTRIBUTE = ELEMENT -------> Left=Fire Up=Normal Right=Ice

THIRD ATTRIBUTE = CLASS -------> Left=Warrior Up=Viking Right=Wizard

5-Slay more monsters with the new class!

6-Spend your coins with upgrades!

Feedback is always welcome! If you liked this game, feel free to leave a comment ;) !
